title: Historical Stock Splits and Corporate Actions for Better Choice Company Inc

content.text:
Date: May 24, 2021
Ratio: 1-for-30
Explanation: Better Choice Company Inc implemented a 1-for-30 reverse stock split. This means that for every 30 shares of the company's stock owned, shareholders received 1 share. The purpose of the reverse split was to increase the stock price per share and meet certain listing requirements on Nasdaq.

Date: February 24, 2021
Action: Acquisition of Top Dog Pet Provisions
Explanation: Better Choice Company Inc completed the acquisition of Top Dog Pet Provisions, a leading provider of premium pet food and treats. This acquisition allowed Better Choice Company Inc to expand its product portfolio and strengthen its position in the pet food industry.
